user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, good fit, and flattering styles. I value items that are made from high-quality materials, such as soft cotton or durable fabrics, and I appreciate features that enhance usability, like stretchy or adjustable elements. I tend to enjoy products that provide a balance between style and practicality, ensuring they can be worn for various occasions. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not fit well, especially if they are too loose or unflattering in shape. I also find poor quality or uncomfortable designs unappealing, particularly when they do not meet my expectations for support or comfort.

conversation.content: I want a comfortable bra that I can sleep in without feeling restricted, and I also need a solution for smoothing underarm bulge during the day. within my expected price range: [20.78, 29.35]
What specific size or cup style do you usually prefer in a bra to ensure maximum comfort and support while sleeping and addressing underarm bulge during the day?

I prefer bras with a comfortable and supportive design, typically opting for a size medium or 36C. For maximum comfort while sleeping and addressing underarm bulge during the day, I look for styles with soft fabrics and smoothing features that provide a seamless look under clothing.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Maidenform Women's Comfort Devotion Bra, Full Coverage Underwire Bra, Cushionwire T-Shirt Bra> / Item ID: B0BQYY4ZCG / Price: $17.47 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Crafted from luxe suede-like fabric, this full coverage bra from Maidenform® feels incredibly soft and comfortable against your skin. Designed with cushioned underwire cups for extra shape and lift without the pinch and dig, this women’s bra is ideal for everyday wear. Convertible straps can be worn straight or crisscross, giving you even more versatile options. Finished with back and side smoothing for a sleek look beneath your clothes, this Maidenform women’s bra offers back hook-and-eye closure for easy styling.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes ComfortFlex Fit Women's Oh So Light Wireless Bra with Comfort Foam, Full-Coverage T-Shirt Bra (S-3XL), MHG521> / Item ID: B08L6CWW3F / Price: $16.1 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Customers say that Hanes® Oh So Light wireless bra is so soft and lightweight that it's almost like wearing no bra at all, other than the flexible support. This sublime comfort starts with silky ComfortFlex Fit® fabric with 4-way stretch that molds effortlessly to your shape. It continues with the flexible, lightly lined foam cups that gently shape and support. Additionally, this ultra-light T-shirt bra is designed with a stay-in-place comfort band that further enhances support. You'll love how this wirefree, full-coverage bra disappears under clothes, and you'll appreciate the lightweight mesh back for airy comfort. And wait, there's more! Convertible straps offer fashion flexibility and tagless styling provides itch-free comfort."]
